content: for the past few years we maren christina janneke zaat juli gittinger and i have hosted a mosaic christmas stocking competition in our facebook groups together we ve created a basic stocking pattern with lots of different mosaic designs so you can crochet your own mosaic crochet christmas stocking the patterns are now available to download for free on ravelry you can use any yarn with the matching hook size just keep in mind the thicker the yarn the larger the stocking and the more room for presents the pattern doesn t include yarn details since it s small and free so it s the perfect excuse to dig into your yarn stash and see what you already have we d love for you to join our groups and share your makes abi and juli - get yer hook on - mosaic crochet community 1 janneke - the dutch hooker crochet 2 our instagram profiles are abi - https //www instagram com/getyerhookon/ 3 janneke https //www instagram com/the_dutch_hooker_crochet/ 4 juli - https //www instagram com/maizeefiberworks/ 5 maren - https //www instagram com/touchable_crochetlove/ 6 1 https //www facebook com/groups/getyerhookon/ 2 https //www facebook com/groups/763213194623150/ 3 https //www instagram com/getyerhookon/ 4 https //www instagram com/the_dutch_hooker_crochet/ 5 https //www instagram com/maizeefiberworks/ 6 https //www instagram com/touchable_crochetlove/
